ComicInfo.Summary:
HULK VERSUS THE WAR DEVILS!
The Hulk and the undead Ghost Rider make amends, but Ghost Rider smells an evil in the air - and it's been terrorizing a small community.
With Bruce's teenage sidekick, Charlie, determined to prove herself as a hero, Hulk must face them down before she gets herself into more trouble than she bargained for!
ComicInfo.Title: Spirits of Vengeance, Part Two
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ceci de la Cruz,Nic Klein,Peach MoMoKo,Sean Parsons,Sergio Fernandez Davila,Tim Levins
